definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִבְעֲרוּ]] Je 10:8 (‖[[יכסלו]]) be stupid, dull-hearted, unreceptive; cf. Pt. pl. [[בּׂעֲרִים]] Ps 94:8 (‖[[כסיליס]]); of inhuman, cruel, barbarous men Ez Eze 21:32.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נִבְעַר]] Je 10:14, Je 51:17, [[נִבְעֲרוּ]] Je 10:21; Pt. [[נִבְעָרָָה]] Is 19:11; —brutish, stupid Is 19:11 ([[עחה]], ‖[[אויל]]); dull-hearted, ignorant of God Je 10:14, Je 10:21, Je 51:17.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וּבִעֵר]] consec. Ex 22:4 feed, graze ([[בשׂדה אחר]]).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יַבְעֶר־]] Ex 22:4 cause to be grazed over, sq. [[שׂדה]].
